chithrapataya nama “adras na“..jaka kiyana widiyata meka rasthiyadukara wachanayak wunata me nirmanaya merata rasthiyadukara sinamawa aayi wathawak haripare yawawi.me chithrapataye wasthu wishaya wenne,ammek appek nathi,athithayak anagathayak nathi,hari haman kamak bimak nathi,andumak paladumak nathi,kotinma kiyanawa nam adras nathi minisunge jiwithayayi.me chithrapatayata aththatama kala lokaye waddan yayi sammatha godak denek dayakathwaya sapayanawa.mahendra,kamal,sabitha,roshan,bimal,channa deshapriya,sunil aariyarathna,rohana wirasinha,prawin jayarathna,nirosha,gayan perera…me wage apuru minisun kandayamakage samuhika prayathnayak thamayi me.me chithrapatayata bara pana darala thiyenne janitha…janitha marasinha.

pahadiliwama ema pa්rakasha sathyaya wikruthi kirimaki.owun uputa dakwana 1978 aanduka්rama wyawasthawama rajaye niladhariya yanna kawurunda washayen artha dakwa athi athara ee anuwa amathyansha niladhariya ganenneda rajaye niladhariyaku washayenya.aanduka්rama wyawasthawe ngangashasha wana parichechdaye artha nirupana yatathe me bawa pahadiliwama dakwa athi athara ehi ‘rajaye niladharaya’ yannen adhikarana niladhariyaku hara janarajaya yatathe watup labana dhurayak darana thanaththek adahas we’ yanuwen sandahanya.eeth eeta, janadhipathiwaraya, kathanayakawaraya, amathyawarayek, aanduka්rama wyawastha sabhawe samajikayek, mathiwarana komishan sabhawe samajikayek, jathika polis komishan sabhawe samajikayek, mathiwarana komasaris jenaralwaraya, mathiwarana komishan sabhawa wisin mathiwarana komishan sabhawata path karana lada niladharayek, adhikarana sewa komishan sabhawe samajikayek, rajya sewa komishan sabhawe samajikayek, niyojya amathyawarayek, parlimenthu mantha්riwarayek, parlimenthuwe maha lekamwaraya, janadhipathiwarayage karya mandalaye samajikayek, parlimenthu maha lekamwarayage karya mandalaye samajikayek ayath nowana bawa sandahanya.ee anuwa amathyansha lekamwaraya yanu aanduka්rama wyawasthawa anuwama rajaye niladhariyaku bawa pahadiliya.

nishantha ponseka yana sakakaruwan handuna ganime perattuwedi kisidu sakkikaruwaku handuna gaththe natha.polisiya adhikaranayata karunu dakwamin kolambaa jathika rohale prathikara labana range bandara parlimenthu manthriwarayagen keti prakashayak labagena athath ohuta assan kirime hakiyawak nothibima nisa wistharathmaka prakashayak laba gatha nohakiwu bawa kiya.sakkikaruwan wana chaminda kumar rathnayaka ha surawira yana mahathwarun polisiyata thawath sakakaruwan gananawakage nama labadi athi bawath eewa ketinam walin labadi athi sakakaruwan pahadiliwa athadanguwata gena nohakiwi thibena bawath kiya.sakakaruwan thawaduratath rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karanne nam palamuwana sakakaruta waidya prathikara labadimata awashya wana bawin ohuta waidya prathikara labadimata bandhanagara niladharinta niyoga karannayi sakakaruwange nithignya ruwan pranandu mahatha adhikaranayen kala illima piligath disa winisuru ke.

balapitiya, walithara siri sugathasasanodaya maha pariwenadhipathi, shasthrapathi panditha ahungalle wimaladhamma thissa nahimiyan wetha 'siri wimalanandi thissa wansawathansa' yana gaurawa nama sammuthiya sahithawa amarapura mulawansika maha nikaye anunayaka dhuraya pilibanda akthrapathra pradanaya, shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe uththarithara mahanayaka, aggamaha panditha kotugoda dhammawasa mahimiyange pradhanathwayen ha hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage sahabhagithwayen me masa 26 wanida paswaru 2.00ta balapitiya walithara ambarukkharama mula mahawiharastha shri nyanawimala thissa dharma mandirayedi sidu kere.

senasuru sama awasthawakadima ashubhadayaka ayurin ki්raya nokarana bawa pahadili kirimatath awabodha karadimatath thawath udaharana rashiyak idiripath kala haki wuwath mema keti satahana thulin senasuru piliba`dawa yami pa්ramanayaka awabodhayak himi wanu atha.senasuru shubhadayaka ayurin janma patha්ragatha wima janmiya wethata yahapathak himi wana bawata niewidanayak bawath awabodha kara gatha yuthuwa atha.obage janma patha්raye senasuru yedi athi thathwaya piliba`da nisi danuwath wimen thorawa senasuru dashawa ho eerashtaka thathwayan ho wenath thathwayan piliba`dawa biya wiya yuthu natha.
